title: Your client is still shit?
body: I currently have two losses in my placements because of the client not loading champion selection and it has made me very sad. I'm currently blaming the client but I'm open to suggestions on what's happening

replies.body: See my response in another thread - maybe it will help - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/mUr6coMP-2nd-freaking-time

I'm not aware of any bugs in the Beta Client that affect the ability to reach champ select, so I'm more inclined to believe this is caused by an *unstable connection* to the matchmaking servers. This is most often caused by certain network settings that conflict with League, so I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your settings locally are fine.

Let me know if this worked for you.
Same problem. Losing LP to feeders and my client. Feelgoodman. {{item:3070}}
